Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the use of canines for contraband screening at correctional facilities housing one hundred or more inmates
Summary: Requires the use of canines for contraband screening at correctional facilities housing one hundred or more inmates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the use of canines for contraband screening at certain correctional facilities
